thread.section_title: Allen School of Health Sciences Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Allen School of Health Sciences | allenschool.edu
thread.title: Deborah
thread.title_full: Allen School of Health Sciences reviewed by Deborah

author: Deborah
title: Deborah
text: I went back to school and after starting was wondering why I did this. I had great support from the staff, the instructors, and fellow students. I could not ask for a better school to go to. I have never gone to an online school before and this is my first experience. They gave everything to me straight, and were very helpful. You can not go wrong, going to this school.
